name: Shellfish closure days
description: Shellfish closure days area-weighted by region as a proxy for access to shellfish gardens

name: FN Commercial fishing licenses
description: Commercial fishing licenses allocated to First Nations (as proportion of total licenses) as a measure of access to commercial fisheries

name: FN Commercial fishing licenses
description: Commercial fishing licenses allocated to First Nations (proportion relative to FN percent population) as a measure of access to commercial fisheries

name: Salmon stock health as a proxy for access to salmon for FSC purposes
description: NA

name: Herring spawn habitat index as a proxy for opportunity to collect herring spawn
description: NA

name: Exposure-weighted coastal forest habitat condition
description: Current condition of coastal forest habitat relative to historical condition weighted by exposure

name: Exposure-weighted salt marsh habitat condition
description: Current condition of salt marsh habitat relative to historical condition weighted by exposure

name: Coastal forest habitat condition
description: Current condition of coastal forest habitat relative to historical condition

name: Coastal chemical pollution
description: Modeled chemical pollution from commercial shipping traffic, ports and harbors, land-based pesticide use (organic pollution), and urban runoff (inorganic pollution)

name: Coastal nutrient pollution
description: Modeled data based on fertilizer consumption from the Food and Agricultural Organization

name: Pathogen pollution
description: population density without access to improved sanitation

name: Marine plastics
description: Global marine plastics

name: B/Bmsy estimates obtained using RAM data
description: The ratio of fish population abundance compared to the abundance required to deliver maximum sustainable yield

name: Catch estimates obtained using RAM data
description: Estimate of total annual catch for a given fishery

name: F/Fmsy estimates obtained using RAM data
description: The ratio of fishery harvest relative to the fishery harvest at maximum sustainable yield

name: Proportional area of stock within each OHIBC region
description: Spatialized stock area for weighting RAM-reported catch across OHIBC regions.

name: EBSA habitat condition
description: Current condition of EBSA habitat based on trawled area

name: Soft Bottom habitat condition
description: Current condition of soft bottom habitat based on trawl effort

name: Salt marsh habitat condition
description: Current condition of salt marsh habitat relative to historical condition

name: Region ID
description: List of iconic species and the regions in which they are found according to IUCN or Aquamaps
units: ICO spp presence within OHIBC regions

name: IUCN or BCSEE extinction risk score
description: IUCN or BCSEE scored extinction risk category for iconic species per assessment year
units: IUCN or BCSEE risk category score

name: IUCN and COSEWIC trend
description: IUCN text field of population trend OR COSEWIC species health time series trend

name: dollars
description: Median household income

name: unemployment rate
description: Mean unemployment rate

name: Inland coastal protected areas
description: Protected areas located 1 km inland

name: Offshore coastal protected areas
description: Protected areas located 3nm offshore

name: Inland area
description: Inland area of OHI regions within 1km of shoreline

name: Offshore area
description: Offshore area of OHI regions within 3nm of shoreline

name: Mariculture harvest
description: Tonnes of mariculture harvest

name: Aquaculture production potential
description: Aquaculture production potential for finfish and shellfish at different reference levels

name: Aquaculture tenure area
description: DFO aquaculture tenures

name: Ocean acidification
description: Ocean acidification pressure scaled using biological thresholds

name: Sea level rise
description: Sea level rise pressure

name: Sea surface temperature anomolies
description: Sea surface temperature anomolies

name: UV radiation pressure
description: Modeled UV radiation based on Erythemal UV Irradiance data provided by GES DISC.

name: High bycatch due to artisanal fishing
description: The presence of destructive artisanal blast and poison (cyanide) fishing.

name: Low bycatch due to artisanal fishing
description: Extent of artisanal fishing (including: artisanal, subsistence, and recreational catch)

name: High bycatch due to commercial fishing
description: Modeled destructive commercial fishing practices by 5 gear types and scaled by Net Primary Productivity

name: Low bycatch due to commercial fishing
description: Modeled destructive commercial fishing practices by 2 gear types and scaled by Net Primary Productivity

name: Targeted harvest of cetaceans and marine turtles
description: Targeted harvest of cetaceans and marine turtles

name: Management and protection of habitat to preserve biodiversity
description: Survey responses by country to the Convention on Biologicial Diversity (CBD) Third National Report: habitat related questions

name: Intertidal habitat destruction
description: Coastal population density (25 mi from shore)  as a proxy for intertidal habitat destruction

name: Subtidal softbottom habitat destruction
description: Demersal destructive commercial fishing practices (i.e., trawling) in softbottom habitat as a proxy for soft bottom habitat destruction

name: Chemical pollution
description: Modeled chemical pollution from commercial shipping traffic, ports and harbors, and pesticide use

name: Nutrient pollution
description: Modeled data based on fertilizer consumption from the Food and Agricultural Organization

name: Management and regulations to control water pollution to preserve biodiversity
description: Survey responses by country to the Convention on Biologicial Diversity (CBD) Third National Report: tourism related questions

name: Nonindigenous species
description: Measure of harmful invasive species

name: Genetic escapes
description: Introduced mariculture species (Mariculture Sustainability Index) as a proxy for genetic escapes

name: Weights of FN Resource Access Opportunities components
description: Status of each component

name: Coastal protection weights
description: Habitat extent multiplied by habitat protection rank for: coral, mangrove (offshore and inland 1km), saltmarsh, sea ice (shoreline), and seagrass

name: Carbon storage weights
description: Habitat extent multiplied by carbon storage capacity for:  mangrove (offshore and inland 1km), saltmarsh, and sea ice

name: Habitat weights
description: List of habitats in each region

name: Weakness of Community Well-Being Index all
description: (1 - Community Well-Being Index) across all OHIBC census subdivisions reporting on four components and overall index

name: Weakness of Community Well-Being Index First Nations
description: (1 - Community Well-Being Index) across OHIBC First Nations census subdivisions reporting on four components and overall index

name: Community Well-Being Index all
description: Community Well-Being Index across all OHIBC census subdivisions reporting on four components and overall index

name: Community Well-Being Index First Nations
description: Community Well-Being Index across OHIBC First Nations census subdivisions reporting on four components and overall index

name: Management and protection of habitat to preserve biodiversity (fisheries)
description: Survey responses by country to the Convention on Biologicial Diversity (CBD) Third National Report: habitat related questions

name: Commercial fishing management
description: Regulations and management of commerical fishing

name: Artisanal fisheries management effectiveness and opportunity
description: The opportunity for artisanal and recreational fishing based on the quality of management of the small-scale fishing sector

name: Coastal protected marine areas to protect fishery resources
description: Protected marine areas within 3nm of coastline

name: EEZ protected marine areas to protect fishery resources
description: Protected marine areas within EEZ to protect fishery resource

name: CITES signatories
description: Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora (CITES) signatories

name: Management of mariculture practices to preserve biodiversity
description: Survey responses by country to the Convention on Biologicial Diversity (CBD) Third National Report: mariculture related questions

name: Mariculture Sustainability Index
description: Mariculture practice assessment criteria from the Mariculture Sustainability Index (MSI)

name: Management of tourism to preserve biodiversity
description: Survey responses by country to the Convention on Biologicial Diversity (CBD) Third National Report: tourism related questions

name: Coastal protected marine areas to protect against habitat destruction
description: Protected marine areas within 3nm of coastline

name: Protected marine areas within EEZ to protect against habitat destruction
description: Protected marine areas within EEZ

name: Management of nonindigenous species
description: Survey responses by country to the Convention on Biologicial Diversity (CBD) Third National Report: invasive species related questions

name: Measure of coastal ecological integrity
description: Marine species condition (same calculation and data as the species subgoal status score)  calculated within 3 nm of shoreline as a proxy for ecological integrity

name: Measure of coastal ecological integrity
description: Marine species condition (same calculation and data as the species subgoal status score)  calculated within eez as a proxy for ecological integrity

name: Region areas based on EEZ boundaries
description: Area of OHIBC regions modified from MaPP boundaries within BC exclusive economic zone

name: Regions
description: Region names by region ID

name: Species population trend
description: Species population trend based on most recent IUCN Red List assessment

name: Species range as pct of region
description: Species range as a percent of region area as determined by IUCN or AquaMaps range maps

name: Species risk category score
description: Species risk score based on IUCN Red List extinction risk category

name: Number of visitors
description: Number of visitors to provincial parks in OHIBC regions

name: Number of visitors
description: Number of visitors to provincial parks in all BC province

name: Number of visitors
description: Number of visitors to visitor centers in OHIBC regions

name: Number of visitors
description: Number of visitors to visitor centers in all BC Province
